a.style: font-family:'Playfair Display', Georgia, 'Times New Roman', 'Liberation Serif', serif

text.tspan: Share with alcohol or drug use disorders, men vs. women, 2019
Alcohol or drug use dependence is defined by the International Classification of Diseases as the presence of three
or more indicators of dependence for at least a month within the previous year. Tobacco smoking is not included.
Share of women with alcohol or drug use disorders
Share of men with alcohol or drug use disorders
Note: To allow comparisons between countries and over time this metric is age-standardized.
Data source: IHME, Global Burden of Disease (2019)
